'''Avathar''' is a Finnish black metal band whose works are inspired by the writings of [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]. They name Austrian black metal band [[Summoning]] as one of their main musical influences.

=== History ===
Inspired by the works of Tolkien, Avathar were founded in [[2000]] as a two-man project of Witch king and Scatha.<ref>{{webcite|articleurl=http://www.metalsoundscapes.com/archives/26977/avathar-released-new-album|articlename=AVATHAR released new album|dated=23 January 2019|accessed=17 March 2019|website=[http://www.metalsoundscapes.com Metal Soundscapes]}}</ref> 

Their work is inspired by the Austrian black metal band [[Summoning]], however their work makes greater use of keyboards and vocals, and the approach to their is in creating soundtracks.<ref>{{webcite|articleurl=http://www.metal-archives.com/reviews/Avathar/Shadows/71739/|articlename=Avathar - Shadows - Reviews|dated=6 August 2008|accessed=17 March 2019|website=[http://www.metal-archives.com/ Metal Archives]}}</ref>
